pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ tathāvādinā ariṭṭhena bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjantipi saṃvasantipi sahāpi seyyaṃ kappenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ tathāvādinā ariṭṭhena bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjissantipi saṃvasissantipi sahāpi seyyaṃ kappessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.5: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṃ tathāvādinā ariṭṭhena bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjathāpi saṃvasathāpi sahāpi seyyaṃ kappethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.8: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṃ tathāvādinā ariṭṭhena bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjissathāpi saṃvasissathāpi sahāpi seyyaṃ kappessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:1.11: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.8: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti evaṃ vādinā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.14: sambhogo nāma dve sambhogā— āmisasambhogo ca dhammasambhogo ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.16: āmisaṃ deti vā paṭiggaṇhāti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.18: uddisati vā uddisāpeti vā, padena uddisati vā uddisāpeti vā, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.19: Akkharāya uddisati vā uddisāpeti vā, akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.21: ukkhittakena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā saṃghakammaṃ vā karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.23: ekacchanne ukkhittake nipanne bhikkhu nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.1.24: Bhikkhu nipanne ukkhittako nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.2.1: Ukkhittake ukkhittakasaññī sambhuñjati vā saṃvasati vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.2.2: Ukkhittake vematiko sambhuñjati vā saṃvasati vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc69:2.2.3: Ukkhittake anukkhittakasaññī sambhuñjati vā saṃvasati vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeti, anāpatti.
